attributes.action: not release sex offenders and murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these people are being sent here for crimes overseas and not locked up or they have been released we have had so many deaths of children teens and the elderly i can not understand why you let them out one day it could your children harmed killed or hurt and if it was then you would never let them be released you do not have to live near these people or have to work with those who are in danger or have been harmed many of us do. I propose that you do not release any one on the sex offerneders list or any one who has killed instead they should be sent to a high security unit away from civilised people
